name: Flint
description: Attack with a blow that can cleave stone
battleEffect: An elemental physical attack 60% stronger than a normal attack

name: Granite
description: Create a mighty earthen barrier
battleEffect: Decreases all damage done to party from enemy attacks by 50%

name: Quartz
description: May revive a downed ally with earth energy
battleEffect: Downed party member has a 60% chance to be revived to 50% HP

name: Vine
description: Tangle multiple foes to drop Agility
battleEffect: Halve all enemies' Agility

name: Sap
description: Drain HP from a foe by nutrient absorption
battleEffect: An elemental physical attack equal to a normal attack with 50 added damage, and the user heals own HP equal to half the damage

name: Ground
description: Use gravity to hold a foe
battleEffect: Quickly prevents one of the target's actions this turn

name: Bane
description: Attack with nature's venom
battleEffect: An elemental physical attack equal to a normal attack with 60 added damage, and may inflict venom

name: Fizz
description: Restore HP with calming water
battleEffect: Restores 60% of a single ally's max HP

name: Sleet
description: Slash a foe with ice to reduce its Attack
battleEffect: Elemental physical attack equal to user's standard physical attack + 30, may lower target's Attack by 25%

name: Mist
description: Attack and lull a foe into a deep sleep
battleEffect: Elemental physical attack equal to Adept's Attack + 30%, may inflict Sleep

name: Spritz
description: Restore party HP with soothing mist
battleEffect: Restore 30% of allies' max HP

name: Hail
description: Freeze a foe to drop its defense
battleEffect: Elemental physical attack equal to Adept's Attack + 40, may lower Defense by 25%

name: Tonic
description: Heal all party ailments
battleEffect: Hall all allies of status ailments

name: Dew
description: Revive a downed ally
battleEffect: Downed party member has a 90% chance to be revived to 80% HP

name: Forge
description: Boost party Attack with flame's fury
battleEffect: 25% boost to all Adepts' Attack Statistics

name: Fever
description: Damage and delude a fow with a heat haze
battleEffect: Elemental physical attack equal to user's standard physical attack + 30, may inflict Delusion

name: Corona
description: Boost party Defense with heat aura
battleEffect: 25% boost to all Adepts' Defense Statistics

name: Scorch
description: Stun a foe with a blast attack
battleEffect: An elemental physical attack equal to a normal attack with 50 added damage, and may inflict Stun

name: Ember
description: Restore party PP with passion's flames
battleEffect: Restore party's PP meters by 7%

name: Flash
description: Block damage to party with a firewall
battleEffect: Decreases all damage done to party from enemy attacks by 90%

name: Torch
description: Penetrate Defense with a melting blast
battleEffect: Elemental physical attack equal to user's standard physical attack + 30, and a chance that only 50% of the target's Defense will apply

name: Gust
description: Buffet foe (perhaps twice) with gale force
battleEffect: Elemental physical attack equal to user's standard physical + 10; chance to double damage

name: Breeze
description: Boost party Resistance with a gentle wind
battleEffect: All Adepts' Resistances + 40

name: Zephyr
description: Boost party Agility with a swift wind
battleEffect: All Adepts' Agility + 100%

name: Smog
description: Veil a foe's vision in smoke
battleEffect: Elemental attack equal to a normal physical attack with +60 damage points; may inflict Delusion

name: Kite
description: Allow an ally to take an extra action
battleEffect: Selected Adept takes two actions the next turn

name: Squall
description: Paralyze a foe with a storm
battleEffect: An elemental physical attack 40% stronger than a normal physical attack; may inflict Stun

name: Luff
description: Seal a foe's Psynergy
battleEffect: Seals the target's Psynergy with full accuracy
